content:
WarpMode Enum

Definition

Specifies the type of warp transformation applied in a stem.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.Warp* method.

In this Article

public enum WarpMode
Inheritance
Object
ValueType
Enum
WarpMode

Remarks

A warp style is used by the Warp method to warp or distort the figures in a graphics path. This can be used to create unusual shapes.

Fields

Bilinear

Specifies a bilinear warp.
Perspective

Specifies a perspective warp.
